description: Ijika Yuuto is http://anidb.net/ch78912 [Rokuro]`s childhood friend, as well as http://anidb.net/ch78911 [Benio]`s twin brother. He likes exorcists and ohagi, but dislikes weak exorcists and his sister. Yuuto is also a former disciple of http://anidb.net/ch79725 [Amakawa Seigen]. He is http://anidb.net/ch78912 [Rokuro]`s and http://anidb.net/ch78911 [Benio]`s main antagonist in this series.
name: Ijika Yuuto
